In childhood I expressed my wishes and demanded their quick fulfillment - if not fulfilled I screamed, and if fulfilled, I completely showed my happiness and existence
In childhood I had a lot of mess and disorder and didn't do my work on time
From childhood I loved bath and water play, and currently I'm also interested in sea and pool, and as soon as I see water I jump into it or spend a long time near it
In adolescence and youth I had many romantic relationships
In adolescence I acted more emotionally and if someone or something upset me I got angry and acted without considering consequences, and also if I loved someone I put my life on the line

Memories of the past are alive for me just like when they occurred! I have great interest in preserving my memories - when I tell memories from very long ago, others are surprised how I remember all of this
I remember all the good and bad done to me, even if I don't show it to the other party at that moment, and I compensate later, sometimes even more
It happens to me that when angry, my body trembles with rage or I curse or punch the wall
It's happened that because of my excessive and uncontrollable emotional reactions, people have humiliated me and sometimes don't even count on me
When taking revenge and settling accounts, such rage seizes my whole being that I think of nothing but revenge
After the anger and rage subsides, I regret what I've done and blame myself

If someone wants to tell me a lie and think I don't understand, I feel my intelligence is insulted, get very angry and definitely prove to them that I know and understand better than them (I'm not a fool!)
When working, I work very hard and at the end of the day feel very tired
In any gathering I'm in, I'm always aware of everything and all details and nothing escapes my eyes
About something I know is right, I'm very insistent
I'm interested that when I go to restaurant, doctor's office, store, supermarket... they recognize me and respect me, and in restaurants I usually give good tips so they remember me
I have deep and emotional relationships with my friends
When my loved ones are sad and upset, I'm completely affected, cry with them, and when happy I'm happy with them and can empathize with them
I don't love myself and many times feel shame from within
In relationship with the opposite sex I'm very emotional and show these feelings in any way I can, whether with verbal tools or giving gifts
Failure and being left in an emotional relationship is very painful and unbearable for me
Hearing 'no' from others, especially the opposite sex, is very heavy for me

In sexual relationship I'm tireless, have intense and uncontrollable desire to the extent that sometimes I'm so possessed by sexual instinct that without considering other considerations and even my spouse's feelings, I think of satisfying myself
I love my children and express this to them, but when angry I lose control and the first targets of my anger are also my children
When I'm in love, I think I'm the most in love, and when I hate someone, I think I'm the most hateful person on earth - when happy I laugh with my whole being and when sad I cry with my whole being
